price: Por certo, aos que crêem e fazem as boas obras, seu Senhor guia-os, por causa de sua Fé: a seus pés, os rios correrão, nos Jardins da Delícia.
arabic: إِنَّ ٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُواْ وَعَمِلُواْ ٱلصَّٰلِحَٰتِ يَهۡدِيهِمۡ رَبُّهُم بِإِيمَٰنِهِمۡۖ تَجۡرِي مِن تَحۡتِهِمُ ٱلۡأَنۡهَٰرُ فِي جَنَّٰتِ ٱلنَّعِيمِ

version.title: Portuguese Translation - Helmy Nasr
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Portugal by Dr. Helmy Nasr. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center -1440.

meta.transliteration: inna alladhīna āmanū waʿamilū al-ṣāliḥāti yahdīhim rabbuhum biīmānihim tajrī min taḥtihimu al-anhāru fī jannāti al-naʿīmi
